newClassifiedsCtrl

  1. - type in module ngClassifieds

Classifieds controller for making new classifieds.

Methods

  • closeSidebar();

    sets vm.sidenavOpen to equal false.

  • saveClassified(classified);

    adds a default contact to a classified then emits the classified to the parent to be saved.

    Parameters

    Param Type Details
    classified Object

    The new classified

Properties

  • sidenavOpen$watch

    Watches for vm.sidenavOpen to be closed, then navigates to /classifieds
